attributes.action: Stop providing schools with carcinogenic (cancerous) products to our children.
attributes.additional_details: We are not making this information up its world world & very much an issue than can be resolved if we all become more aware & educate our family, friends, loved ones & general public on the devistaging affects eating meat & dairy products is having on the world as a whole. If something radical is not done their will be no future for our children's children and the rest of existence. People & animals are suffering because we chose too live a mindless lifestyle.. For food & fashion! Unacceptable.
attributes.background: On Earth 2018 animal agriculture is a direct link too famine, global warming & most importantly poor health. Why are we feeding our children products of rape &  Murder when their is the healthier option? Also want a age limit on these products like alcohol, fags & sexual content do.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
